titles: His Majesties letter to the Parliament
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Scotland. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most Excellent Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Camp at Becklar the 10 and 20th day of June 1695, and of Our Reign the 7th. year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
